books.title: Relief with Rails
books.subtitle: A Practical Guide to Calmer Software
books.author: Troy Latter
books.description: A practical guide for experienced Ruby on Rails developers who want calmer, more resilient systems. Focuses on naming, structure, boundaries, and defaults that reduce stress over time.

books.title: The Australian Family Guide to Social Media
books.subtitle: What Parents Need to Know Before the Age Restrictions Begin
books.author: Troy Latter
books.description: Australia is the first major nation to restrict social media for children under 16. This comprehensive guide gives families the patterns, evidence, and practical strategies.

books.title: 7 Dimensions of Digital Child Protection
books.subtitle: Beyond the Ban: Australia's Social Media Minimum Age
books.author: Troy Latter
books.description: A comprehensive analysis for policy makers, educators, and researchers. Examines account access, tracking, retention, migration, infrastructure, alternatives, and frameworks.
